site_name: 6673 NW 30th St - Smoky Mountain Zoological Park
narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this Re-License inspection. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection and site approval inspection for a Class "C” license. The inspection and exit briefing 
were conducted with the applicant. The applicant is ready to be licensed under the AWA. 
 
A copy of your license will be sent to you without any additional action on your part. If you have not received your license 
within 30 days, please contact the USDA at 970-494-7478.
